pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī araññe viharati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.3: Tassāyasmato vihāro abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā itthiyo ārāmaṃ āgamaṃsu vihārapekkhikāyo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.5: Atha kho tā itthiyo yenāyasmā udāyī tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.8: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī tā itthiyo vihāraṃ pekkhāpetvā tāsaṃ itthīnaṃ vaccamaggaṃ passāvamaggaṃ ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati avaṇṇampi bhaṇati yācatipi āyācatipi pucchatipi paṭipucchatipi ācikkhatipi anusāsatipi akkosatipi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.9: Yā tā itthiyo chinnikā dhuttikā ahirikāyo tā āyasmatā udāyinā saddhiṃ uhasantipi ullapantipi ujjagghantipi uppaṇḍentipi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.10: Yā pana tā itthiyo hirimanā tā nikkhamitvā bhikkhū ujjhāpenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.1.12: Sāmikenapi mayaṃ evaṃ vuttā na iccheyyāma, kiṃ panāyyena udāyinā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.1: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.2: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā udāyī mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.3: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.4: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.5: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, udāyi, mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.8: “ananucchavikaṃ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.9: Kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.10: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sarāgāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:1.2.14: “Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāseyya yathā taṃ yuvā yuvatiṃ methunupasaṃhitāhi, saṃghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:2.8: rattampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ, duṭṭhampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ mūḷhampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:2.9: Api ca rattaṃ cittaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetaṃ vipariṇatanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:2.11: manussitthī, na yakkhī, na petī, na tiracchānagatā. Viññū paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitaṃ duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṃ ājānituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:2.17: daharo dahariṃ, taruṇo taruṇiṃ, kāmabhogī kāmabhoginiṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.1.1: Dve magge ādissa vaṇṇampi bhaṇati, avaṇṇampi bhaṇati, yācatipi, āyācatipi, pucchatipi, paṭipucchatipi, ācikkhatipi, anusāsatipi, akkosatipi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.1.21: puṭṭho bhaṇati— “evaṃ dehi. Evaṃ dentā sāmikassa piyā bhavissati manāpā cā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:3.1.23: apuṭṭho bhaṇati— “evaṃ dehi. Evaṃ dentā sāmikassa piyā bhavissati manāpā cā”ti.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī navarattaṃ kambalaṃ pārutā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.1.2: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṃ itthiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.1.6: Tassa kukkuccaṃ ahosi “bhagavatā sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, kacci nu kho ahaṃ saṃghādisesaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kharakambalaṃ pārutā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.2.2: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṃ itthiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī navāvutaṃ kambalaṃ pārutā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.3.2: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṃ itthiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kharakambalakaṃ pārutā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.4.2: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṃ itthiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī pāvāraṃ pārutā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.5.2: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṃ itthiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī khettaṃ vapāpetvā āgacchati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.6.2: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṃ itthiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.7.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu paribbājikaṃ paṭipathe passitvā sāratto taṃ paribbājikaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.8.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sāratto aññataraṃ itthiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.8.3: Api ca yaṃ sāmikassa desi taṃ nāmhākaṃ desī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.9.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sāratto aññataraṃ itthiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.9.3: Api ca yaṃ aggadānaṃ taṃ nāmhākaṃ desī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.10.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kammaṃ karoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss3:4.10.2: Aññataro bhikkhu sāratto taṃ itthiṃ etadavoca—
